desc_content.paragraph: Bases: AppConfig

section.title: openedx.core.djangoapps.config_model_utils.models module
section.paragraph: StackedConfigurationModel: A ConfigurationModel that can be overridden at site, org and course levels

desc_content.paragraph: Bases: Enum
Provenance enum
Bases: ConfigurationModel
A ConfigurationModel that stacks Global, Site, Org, Course, and Course Run level configuration values.
Bases: object
Return configuration for all courses
Return the name of the key to use to cache the current configuration
A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.
Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.
In the example:
Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Hook for doing any extra model-wide validation after clean() has been called on every field by self.clean_fields. Any ValidationError raised by this method will not be associated with a particular field; it will have a special-case association with the field defined by NON_FIELD_ERRORS.
Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.
In the example:
Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.
Return the current overridden configuration at the specified level.
Only one level may be specified at a time. Specifying multiple levels will result in a ValueError.
For example, considering the following set of requirements:

block_quote.paragraph: Global: Feature Disabled edx.org (Site): Feature Enabled HarvardX (org): Feature Disabled HarvardX/CS50 (org_course): Feature Enabled CS50 in 2018_Q1 (course run): Feature Disabled

desc_content.paragraph: Assuming these values had been properly configured, these calls would result

block_quote.paragraph: MyStackedConfig.current() # False MyStackedConfig.current(site=Site(domain=’edx.org’)) # True MyStackedConfig.current(site=Site(domain=’whitelabel.edx.org’)) # False – value derived from global setting MyStackedConfig.current(org=’HarvardX’) # False MyStackedConfig.current(org=’MITx’) # True – value derived from edx.org site MyStackedConfig.current(org_course=’HarvardX/CS50’) # True MyStackedConfig.current(org_course=’HarvardX/Bio101’) # False – value derived from HarvardX setting MyStackedConfig.current(course_key=CourseKey(org=’HarvardX’, course=’CS50’, run=’2018_Q1’)) # False MyStackedConfig.current(
) # True – value derived from HarvardX/CS50 setting
bio101 = CourseKey(org=’HarvardX’, course=’Bio101’, run=’2018_Q1’) MyStackedConfig.current(course_key=cs50) # False – value derived from HarvardX org

desc_content.paragraph: The following calls would result in errors due to overspecification:

list_item.paragraph: site – The Site to check current values for
org – The org to check current values for
org_course – The course in a specific org to check current values for
course_key – The course to check current values for

field_body.paragraph: An instance of cls.attribute_tuple() with the overridden values specified down to the level of the supplied argument (or global values if no arguments are supplied).
